'''''The Lonely Mountain: Lair of Smaug the Dragon''''' is a 1984 board game from [[Iron Crown Enterprises]], based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Hobbit]]''.

== Cover Text ==

Based upon J.R.R. Tolkien's THE HOBBIT

You control a group of adventurers as they sneak into Smaug's lair and try to gather as much Dwarven treasure as possible. In this multi-player game you must avoid or overcome the threat of other player's groups, then escape with your booty before Smaug awakens and discovers the intruders...
